email_content:
Hi Lisa,

I hope you’re doing well. I’ve been exploring MarketHub’s offerings and noticed some great options that fit our needs. Before we move forward, I wanted to ask whether there are any current or upcoming discounts or promotions we could take advantage of.

I’ve also been checking resources such as MyDealFinder to stay updated on deals, so if there’s anything listed there—or elsewhere—that I should look at, please let me know.

Thanks in advance for your help. I appreciate any details you can share and look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
